archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.3.3a: a) acquired (e.g. purchased, leased or open-sourced) from approved and reputable suppliers (i.e. those with a proven record of providing robust and reliable software)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
